SummaryEnglish: Pre-school show Tish Tash follows the adventures of a young bear called Tish, her bear family and her larger-than-life imaginary friend Tash, as they learn about the world around them. No matter what troubles they face — be it surviving long, boring car trips or helping Tish’s baby brother not to be too sad about losing his favourite toy — these special friends can create new worlds around themselves, embarking on fun adventures while inspiring imaginative play and problem solving in young children.

1.SummaryEnglish: The whole family are in the car on their way to the seaside. However, they are currently stuck in a traffic jam for the ferry.

2.SummaryEnglish: Tish receives a lot of chocolate through the post after winning a sweetie completion and shows them off proudly to show her family.

3.SummaryEnglish: Bobby and Tish are outside in the garden having a picnic, they each have one cookie left each. Tish gobbles hers up like a cookie eating monster but before Bobby can eat his, an ant steals it away!

4.SummaryEnglish: The family have all gone to the park to visit the playground. However, when they arrive there is a group of kids already playing on the climbing frame.

5.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Bobby go into Rosa's art studio, even though they aren't meant to go in there without her. Tish then, accidently, knocks ink all over Rosa's latest picture.

6.SummaryEnglish: Tish has her first ever ballet exam the next day - we join her practicing before bed. Pola sticks his head in and says she's doing a good job - but getting a good night's rest will help more.

7.SummaryEnglish: It's Saturday afternoon and Tish and Pola have had to come to the supermarket at the busiest time. Both look a bit perturbed as they stand at the threshold of the sliding doors.

8.SummaryEnglish: Tish is in the midst of an imaginative adventure, dressed in shining armour and about to rescue a Tash in distress. Suddenly Bobby appears in the same armour striking the same heroic pose.

9.SummaryEnglish: After dinner Tish and Bobby ask for dessert but Rosa admits there is none. She suggests Pola's boiled sweets instead but then suddenly the lights go out!

10.SummaryEnglish: Tish has a collection of 'Surprise Egg Friend' figurines but one is missing. Tiny tortoise is nowhere to be seen!

11.SummaryEnglish: Tish is learning the piano and is trying to play a new song. She's new to it and struggling because she wants to be good straight away.

12.SummaryEnglish: Rosa and Pola are planning a family movie afternoon, but Tish and Bobby can't decide on what to watch.

13.SummaryEnglish: Tish is at Tobby's birthday party along with her friends Cori and Jeffy. Tobby has just opened his presents and Tish can't wait to play with them.

14.SummaryEnglish: Tish is having a quiet day at home. Rosa is working, Pola is gardening. Bobby is counting is blocks, one to twenty-hundred... Tish keeps thinking of questions to ask.

15.SummaryEnglish: Today Pola, Tish and Bobby are decorating a cake for Rosa. Tish suggests it should be a Fish Cake with a chocolate truffle as its eye.

16.SummaryEnglish: It's a raining outside, so Tish has planned her day in doors with a list of all the things that she wants to do. However, Pola and Rosa asks Tish to keep Bobby occupied.

17.SummaryEnglish: Tish is struggling to get out of bed for this morning and Tash shows up to help her get ready for school.

18.SummaryEnglish: Pola is pretending to be a horse for Bobby and Tish but just before it's Tish's turn, Pola gets up saying he wants a rest.

20.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Rosa are heading to a local shop and Tish is excited because her favourite comic The Gateway Gang, which she gets every week, comes out today.

21.SummaryEnglish: Rosa and Tish have just arrived from the shops. Tish has brought a cuddly toy with her - a dragon.

22.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Bobby are lying in the garden looking at the clouds up in the sky, seeing all the different shapes from a car to a baby goat.

23.SummaryEnglish: Tish has been invited to the waterpark with her friend Cori but Pola peers into Tish's room to let her know all the family is sick!

24.SummaryEnglish: Tish and her friends have just been set homework to paint themselves in the future. All of Tish's friends seem certain on their future jobs but Tish is not sure at all.

25.SummaryEnglish: Tobby and Jeffy have come to play at Tish's house. It's all fun and games until Pola's blueberry pie is stolen!

26.SummaryEnglish: Tish and her family are going out for a meal at a pizza place and Tish has worked out exactly what she's going to have.

27.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Bobby are stuck outside on an extremely hot day. Determined not to be without a house, Tish walks around the garden looking for a solution.

28.SummaryEnglish: Rosa is in her studio struggling with her latest painting for a diaper advert and is getting frustrated. Tish offers to help her along with the help of Tash.

29.SummaryEnglish: Stuck indoors for the day, Tish and Bobby play a board game, Snakes and Ladders. Tish is winning however, so Bobby starts to cheat a little. Annoyed, Bobby storms off when Tish corrects him.

30.SummaryEnglish: After Bobby has a nightmare about falling, he doesn't want to sleep alone. Rosa suggests he shares Tish's bed.

31.SummaryEnglish: Hungry, Tish finds an interesting-looking pot of kimchi in the fridge and digs in - something she quickly regrets when she realises how spicy it is!

32.SummaryEnglish: It's Saturday and Tish wants to watch her 'Zoo Friends' TV show but Rosa insists she finish her chores.

33.SummaryEnglish: Tish stuggles with maths homework and wants to give up. Rosa encourages her and tempts her with a pie after her homework is complete.

34.SummaryEnglish: On a scorching hot day, Tish is desperate for an ice-cream - something Rosa says she can't have until the freezer is defrosted by Pola!

35.SummaryEnglish: Pola gifts Tish a magic set and challenges her to learn at least one trick by the end of the day - she excitedly agrees.

36.SummaryEnglish: The family are going camping but Tish doesn't want to get her new shoes muddy, which will be difficult when Rosa and Pola tell Tish to look after Bobby.

37.SummaryEnglish: During a football game with her friends, Tish notices that Cori is ignoring Jeffy, causing Jeffy to feel left out and alone.

38.SummaryEnglish: The family are on a nature walk when Pola spots a modern, glass-bottom bridge that can take them to another viewing point. He, Rosa and Bobby zip on over, while Tish hangs back, nervous.

39.SummaryEnglish: At the end of a library trip and agreeing to meet Rosa at the front entrance, Tish realises she needs help finding a book about pyramids.

40.SummaryEnglish: After Tish gets her kite stuck high up in a tree, Tash suggests they go and find a dinosaur to help them get it back.

41.SummaryEnglish: Tish and her friends are disappointed to find the playground closed for construction. Unsure what to do next, the gang climb the sand dunes, looking for the desert oasis.

42.SummaryEnglish: Tish is excited about the marbles competition at school, but an accident with Bobby causes her mood to sour after the marbles scatter around the room.

43.SummaryEnglish: Tish, Cori and Tobby are visiting Jeffy's house today - Jeffy, unfortunately, is not in a good mood due to a damaged toy. Tish, Cori and Tobby decide they'll work together to cheer her up.

44.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Bobby are playing with building blocks in Bobby's bedroom but Rosa is displeased at the mess they've made.

45.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Pola have set up a yard sale but Tish is having no luck selling anything and, when a customer shows up, Tish fails to win them over.

46.SummaryEnglish: Tish is struggling to eat with a wobbly tooth. Tash suggests they shrink themselves down to check out the tooth in person.

47.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Bobby are having trouble finishing their vegetables during dinner time so, Rosa and Pola have taken away the cake until they are finished.

48.SummaryEnglish: Tish and Bobby are out playing in the rain. Pola is shocked to see them covered in mud, so tells them to take a bath.

49.SummaryEnglish: Tish, Bobby and Pola go out shopping for Rosa's birthday presents, but with little time left before they have to go home, they each try find the perfect present.

50.SummaryEnglish: Pola has forgotten to buy the meat for the family barbecue so, to avoid the barbecue being postponed, Tish proposes they hunt for vegetables for the barbecue instead.

51.SummaryEnglish: Tish is left in charge of the Christmas Tree decorations, but Bobby keeps getting in the way of her plans.

52.SummaryEnglish: It's bedtime and Rosa is about to read the story 'The Prince Who Saved the Princess' which Tish is not happy about.
